name: Circletree
tagline: Tool for converting a regular dendrogram to a circular one.
body:
CircleTree
==========
Everybody loves circular dendrograms. They give you more space in the margin to fill with annotations and flirts with the awesome [Circos](http://circos.ca) plots. Here's my go at it in R.

### Installation
At the moment the whole project just consist of a single script that you source into R and you're good to go. If people like it might brush it up and turn it into a CRAN package, so let me know what you think!

### Usage
```
x <- hclust(my.data)
plot(x)
plot(circletree(x))
```
